Name: disaster-risk-reduction
Title: DRR | AidIQ.com
Body:
Disaster Risk Reduction

Disasters will always happen, however there is much that we can do to reduce the risk that these have a negative impact upon us.

Risk Mapping

Map the Hazards, both Natural and Man-made

Community Resilience Mapping

Map the Vulnerable members of the community, Map the Resources available to the community including Evacuation Routes

Case Studies

  • Climate Data Portal. Nepal Departmenty of Hydrology and Metereology
  • CRMT: Community Resilience Mapping Tool. Los Angeles County Public Health
  • DRRPP: Disaster Risk Reduction Project Portal. Asia Disaster Preparedness Center
  • Map the Philippines. Making All Voices Count
  • RMS: Resource Management System (Vulnerability module). International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
